Class# CFPlugInInstance

iOSiPadOSMac CatalystmacOStvOSvisionOSwatchOS

```
class CFPlugInInstance
```

## [Overview](/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFPlugInInstance#Overview)

CFPlugInInstance is deprecated. Use the functions defined by [`CFPlugIn`](/documentation/corefoundation/cfplugin) instead.
